metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32762 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.15.14, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.xthrough 6.5.x before 6.5.1. Qt Network incorrectly parses thestrict-transport-security (HSTS) header, allowing unencrypted connectionsto be established, even when explicitly prohibited by the server. Thishappens if the case used for this header does not exactly match.

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
